me pada peliya mata mulinma ahanna labenne ma podi kalaye rasa windapu “kumbaichchi” katunaye thema githayen.samajaye samasthayak lesa baluwama ithamath shakthi hina kottashayak wuwath thamange aramuna kara ekamuthuwa,thamange eka adagena yana kumbaiyage gunangaya methanadi ismathu karala thiyenawa kiyala mata hithenawa.kumbaiyo thema githaye nirmanakaru wana “achala solamans” ge gipada rachana rasa winda thibunath mage mathakaya diwa yana widihata ma rasa windi ohuge palamu sangitha nirmanaya meyayi.ohu wisin prekshakayata hurupurudu wachana pela hadawathe ridmayata samipawa hithata danena ayurin prathi nirmanaya kara athi hati apurwayi.githaye ek thanaka “ek sankhyathayak us kara dakwima” magin hada kiri gahena ayurin kumbaiyo ha samajaya athara athi bedima ho kathangaye idiriyedi athiwana yam kisi bindawatimak sankethawath kirimata ohu uthsaha dara athi bawa ma wishwasa karanawa.

welayudan, nihal athulathmudali sakasuma – lanka chithragaraya wishesha shabda – lesli premasiri ka ාrmika upakarana sapayima - ee. ee. pi. chithrapata, disanayaka chithrapata, sunil rediyo githa patigatha kirima – nimal wirakkodi nishpadana kalamanakaru - sheltan perera nishchala chayarupa – matin perera sangitha adhyakshanaya – aacharya premasiri kemadasa githa prabandhaya - jorj lesli ranasinha, premakirthi da alwis, aacharya ajantha ranasinha githa -ran samanala thatumatha hapila - ech. aar. jothipala, latha walpola lassana lassana mal - ech. aar. jothipala wishwasayayi – kalarans wijewardhananalu niliyan - jo abewikrama (relgad), soniya disanayaka (relgadge birinda) jayantha das perera (bandu), jenita samarawira, mamohari wimalathunga, wijaya nandasiri, don sirisena, harbat amarawikrama, latishiya piris, wimala kumari, lenin wikrama aarambhaka sinama shala - elfinstan – maradana, niw metro - nugegoda , wijitha – rathmalana, gamunu - waththala, rigal - migamuwa, jayamini – panadura, prins - galla, wijayanthi – kaduwela, muwiton – dalugama, niw sigiri – katugasthota, modarn- kurunagala, jothi rathnapuraya, shri lanka - wennappuwa, wijaya – ampara yahalu yehelithiragatha wu dinaya – 1982 desambar 24 nishpadanaya – mak jayawardhana, royi jayawardhana adhyakshanaya - sumithra piris kathawa, debas saha thira natakaya – karunasena jayalath (ohuge menamin yuth nawakathawa asurin) sahaya adhyakshanaya – wi.
